mapper.select: select sum(reception) as reception, sum(payment) as payment from T_ACCOUNT_RECEPTION where month like #{month}

select r.custName as customerName, r.reception as reception, (case when p.payment is null then 0 else p.payment end) as payment from (select o.custName custName, sum(d.totlment) reception from t_storage_deliver d, t_order o where d.orderIdentify = o.identify group by o.custName)r left join (select tranuser, sum(tranamount) payment from t_transaction where trantype = 1 group by tranuser)p on r.custName = p.tranuser
